abstract: Members of a Congressional caucus want Google to explain how it will protect privacy with the introduction of Google Glass.
snippet: Members of a Congressional caucus want Google to explain how it will protect privacy with the introduction of Google Glass.
lead_paragraph: Eight members of Congress on Thursday formally demanded that Google address a range of privacy concerns about its new wearable technology device, Google Glass.

headline.main: Lawmakers Show Concerns About Google’s New Glasses
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers Show Concerns About Google’s New Glasses
